name: Suspended Crosses
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a hanging position with your arms extended above your head and a suspenders bar or two resistance bands holding your body.
2. Keeping your abs engaged and your core tight, lift one arm out to your side until it's at a 45-degree angle from your body.
3. Hold for a brief moment, contracting the muscle on the affected side.
4. Then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position without touching your hand behind your back.
5. Repeat with both sides to work the chest and shoulders.
short_summary: A strength training exercise that targets the Shoulders and Chest, utilizing suspenders or resistance bands.
